definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
see 謎兒|谜儿[mei4 r5], riddle

sentences.english: Find the first clue unraveling the mystery.
sentences.chinese: 找到了第一條解謎的線索。

sentences.english: It is a first-person horror game, heavily focused on puzzle solving.
sentences.chinese: 這是一款第一人稱驚悚遊戲，嚴重專注於解謎要素。

sentences.english: The clues to solving them are all around, hidden in plain sight.
sentences.chinese: 解謎的線索到處都是，藏在我們能夠一覽無遺的地方。

sentences.english: Find the final clue unraveling the mystery, alone or with another ODST.
sentences.chinese: 單人或跟隊友找到了最後一條解謎的線索。

sentences.english: And if you would know God be not therefore a solver of riddles .
sentences.chinese: 而假如你們願意瞭解上帝就不要因此成爲一個解謎者。

sentences.english: Find the 3rd clue unraveling the mystery, alone or with another ODST.
sentences.chinese: 單人或跟隊友找到了第三條解謎的線索。

sentences.english: Find out in this heart-pounding hidden-object puzzle adventure.
sentences.chinese: 請在這場扣人心絃的解謎冒險中找到答案。

sentences.english: This is a classic Unblock game.
sentences.chinese: 一款經典的障礙解謎遊戲。

sentences.english: And if you would know God be not therefore a solver of riddles.
sentences.chinese: 如果你們想認識上帝，那就不要去做解謎者。

definition: to dress up and make up (like an actor)
Tun District – area of Taichung (in Taiwan) between the coastal (western) part of the city and the mountains to the east
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
to give a small demonstration of one's impressive skills (idiom)
to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
the feeling that sth is genuine/sense of reality/in the flesh
